About the Company: Oswal Yarns Ltd was established in the year 2003. They are one of the pioneer in textile in northern india having its Corporate office at Ludhiana, Punjab. The group has existence for last 40 years with core competency of spinning. The Oswal Group is mainly into spinning & dyeing (all types of yarns in different blends), manufacturing of fabric and garments. The group has plans to diversify in future but mainly in textile related activities.
